features: Outdoor Amphibious RC Cars：Fuuy amphibious remote control car not only driving in the land, but also surf on the water! Smooth race on both land & water front & back flips, 360 degree spins. using a fully sealed design to effectively prevent water from enter the battery compartment , making the waterproof run in any weather, anywhere, anytime!

Powerful Built-in Engine RC Boat: Equipped with a energy-efficient power motor can race up to 15km/h(9+mph) in a short time. Excellent dynamic performance, shockproof and shatterproof off road stunt car for rivers, lakes, beaches, grassland, sandy land, rugged mountain roads, pool toy. Having an excited outdoor explore!

Cute Baby Shark with LED Light: Unique shark design with colorful led lights bringing a lot of fun to child from day to night. Best outdoor kids pool toys to play in the beach, balance and develop a kid's sense of direction to open up a new world of fun!

Safety and Durable RC Car Toys: Off-road RC Crawler is made of high-quality ABS plastic making the RC car body more durable and shockproof. The Remote Controll car can rotate and fall from steps without broken, it will bring the utmost fun to play with kids.

Perfect Gifts for Kids: FUUY cool drift RC cars are great indoor & outdoor toys , absolutely a perfect gift for kids, birthday party, Halloween, Christmas, and New Year's. At FUUY, we are determined to provide the new and best toys for your kid. All batteries are included!!! Nice gifts presents for 6 - 12 Years Old Kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Both car + remote controls are waterproof!!
reviews.reviewText: awesome toy. I have tried a few others but this is one of the best so far. 5+Battery life is short .. like 20 mins or so, it would be nice to have an additional battery or a larger battery. also compartment to plug the the battery could be "screwless"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this remote control car. It takes a little bit to get the hang of driving it with the bracelet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars is good toy for kid
reviews.reviewText: Easy to control. Just need be more little. bigger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This RC car was a hit with the girl I gifted it to. She was delighted with the pink color and she was happy with how fast it went. The battery lasts quite a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This car can go on land and in water! Its so much fun to drive around at the lake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This car wheels lights up spins in and out of water this car is very durable this car goes over rocks sand tree water this car would be a perfect gift fir a birthday or Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this is stunning when we first have it in the pool. It grabbed all the attentions from both other parents and kids in the pool as soon as it stated to run in the water. It would be perfect if the battery for the remote is also rechargeable. Thebattery in the car last just enough for our time in the pool. The battery in the car can be easily recharge. Teenagers actually enjoy this toy well just like my seven year old daughter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute car, works great, long battery life
reviews.reviewText: This is a very cute, very great quality car! The battery life is wonderful, so much longer than the battery life in your typical RC cars, it charges pretty quickly as well. The remotes connect to it wonderfully and they are both easy to control and get the RC car to do as you want it to as well. It does float in our pool and once you get it started it works incredibly well, it goes forward, backward, and all directions. It works great on land too whether it is in grass or on a smooth surfaced floor or driveway/carport. Packaged very neatly and has very clear instructions as well. Great quality all around. The controller for the water is not as waterproof as you would like, water did get in it and caused a slight problem with it as far as working as it should.
